Here's what they had to say→ https://t.co/k6fOIVfSNG
label: R

text: Hope is not a strategy—especially when it comes to our national security. Policies the Administration is advancing—like troop withdrawals and drawdowns from the Middle East—have extraordinary potential to be misinterpreted and should be reconsidered. https://t.co/E7j183wNI7
label: R

text: Our interests in the world go beyond simply protecting the homeland. It's vital to U.S. national security that we help keep events throughout the world from escalating until they ultimately do represent a threat to our security. https://t.co/UUqjcSAOPb
label: R

text: Accidents caused by flash floods and heavy rainstorms can be prevented by taking precautionary measures. As floods continue to run through communities across Utah, it’s important we each do our part to avoid anything unsafe, like driving through flood waters. https://t.co/8B4eUTHhmr
label: R

text: Attempting to force Krystsina Tsimanouskaya to leave the Olympic Games is the latest move by the Lukashenko regime to silence those who dare to criticize. I stand with this brave Olympian—this violation of basic human rights must not be tolerated. https://t.co/1BNS987SQo
label: R

text: A large portion of Utah is currently under flash flood watch or warning. @NWSSaltLakeCity provides resources and updates on flooding and other extreme weather events. I encourage Utahns to refer to these resources to ensure their safety and well-being. https://t.co/cid8FfvatT
label: R

text: Congratulations to Herriman native Rhyan White for helping @TeamUSA bring home a silver medal in the women’s 4x100-meter medley relay. She’s the first U.S. Olympic swimmer from our state to bring home a medal. Utah is immensely proud! https://t.co/l0HtL20XNt
label: R

text: Multiple flash floods are tearing across Utah, affecting communities from Bountiful to Cedar City. As we continue to monitor the situation, I urge Utahns to stay safe and reach out to others who may be in need. https://t.co/l9VPQga6Nc
label: R

text: Utah wouldn't have had a seat at the table if Democrats acted alone on infrastructure. Our bipartisan bill limits spending on bad policy that only benefits the coastal cities, and brings home measures to improve wildfire prevention and drought mitigation. https://t.co/e6f6IMlY6v
label: R

text: Our bipartisan bill focuses on physical infrastructure without raising taxes or adding to the debt. It demonstrates that the Senate can work in a bipartisan way, as the American people expect us to do. And that is a victory over those who seek to abolish the filibuster. https://t.co/d7JZxKAloI
label: R

text: Congratulations to former @UtahGymnastics athlete @mykaylaskinner! Your incredible story proves that determination and grit pays off in the end. You make us proud. #TeamUSA https://t.co/fIozL5lgUg
label: R

text: Col. Gail S. Halvorsen was a beacon of hope for many in the aftermath of the World War II–a hero who exemplifies the best of humanity and embodies Utah’s kindness and spirit of service. It is only fitting that we rename the Provo Vet Center in his honor. https://t.co/PAmWpV4zo3
label: R

text: The @CapitolPolice work tirelessly to protect our democracy. Today, the Senate ensured they have the funding necessary to maintain operations and secure the Capitol. The security bill also reimburses @UTNationalGuard for their support efforts this year. https://t.co/0LJJlIHoYd
label: R

text: Our bipartisan infrastructure bill has cleared its next hurdle in the Senate. Proud to have helped negotiate this bill which includes funding that will help Utah rebuild its roads, mitigate drought conditions, fulfill critical water needs, and prepare for & respond to wildfires.
label: R

text: This is not a "national security" law–it's an assault on liberty by the CCP. It’s a damning indictment of the law that simply demanding promised freedoms is considered secession. This verdict sets a frightening precedent for freedom-loving people in Hong Kong. https://t.co/UEh364ycnb
label: R

text: E-cigarettes should be subject to the same user fees as traditional forms of tobacco. By authorizing @US_FDA to collect user fees on e-cigarettes, our bill will help tackle the vaping crisis and protect the lives of children in Utah & across the country. https://t.co/ocOBv880Hn
label: R

text: The Administration isn't taking the enforcement of immigration laws seriously. Calls to eliminate or defund @ICEgov are purely political and if answered, would jeopardize our national security. https://t.co/IzlhaLZ1NF
label: R

text: It’s absurd to assume that we can address the crisis at our southern border by magically eliminating corruption and violence throughout Latin America. @DHSgov needs to take the border crisis seriously. https://t.co/9Q4nUhH1Xv
label: R

text: What’s happening at our southern border is a crisis—yet there’s been no acknowledgement from the Administration. The scenes from our southern border are both alarming and threatening to our national security and economic vitality. https://t.co/LRGu2TxILy
label: R

text: The nation will remember Mike Enzi as a man of integrity and character. We would all do well to follow his example of treating others with respect and dignity. Ann and I share our profound condolences and sincere prayers for his family and loved ones.
label: R

text: Deeply saddened by this news. Praying for my friend’s recovery and the well-being of his loved ones during this difficult time. https://t.co/IHN17ZsxCb
label: R

text: Heartbroken over the tragic deaths and injuries following a 22-vehicle pileup near Fillmore on Sunday. Ann and I are praying for the victims and their loved ones as we grieve this terrible loss. https://t.co/ThWOdaqGQV
label: R

text: Utah is the second largest producer of tart cherries in the nation. Last week, I visited with Payson Fruit Growers, a co-op of family farms, to learn more about the challenges they’re facing—namely labor shortages, current trade practices, and the historic drought. https://t.co/ll0IxMOhJS
label: R

text: To all of the @Olympics athletes competing for @TeamUSA, especially my fellow Utahns, best of luck in Tokyo. Stay safe and healthy—we are cheering you on! #TokyoOlympics 🇺🇸 https://t.co/J0SF4xvSr1
label: R

text: As Utahns commemorate the anniversary of the arrival of the pioneers to the Salt Lake Valley, I hope we remember the great sacrifice and determination of the brave souls who helped build up our extraordinary state. Happy #PioneerDay! https://t.co/aEKG4adt6H
label: R

text: Tonight, Americans will be able to watch the @Olympics opening ceremonies during prime time. Great to see @eddyalvarez90, a former @BruinAthletics baseball star, bearing the United States flag. Go @TeamUSA! https://t.co/3H3FNguInG
label: R

text: Capping off the day at the Days of ‘47 Cowboy Games & Rodeo on the eve of #PioneerDay. It’s quite fun to be the guest of @AnnRomney! https://t.co/SKwPkDZO4H
label: R

text: Thanks to Utah’s pro-business climate, global companies like Stadler are coming here to grow their business. Toured their facility in Salt Lake to see their production—and even drove a train! We must ensure our policies continue to support businesses that employ Utahns. https://t.co/1GDqJqOnHo
label: R

text: On #PioneerDay, Utahns come together to celebrate and honor the legacy of our state’s pioneers. Kicked off this year’s celebrations with the Days of ‘47 Sunrise Service at Assembly Hall. https://t.co/pvZzaRp6RS
label: R

text: Our finest athletes have traveled to Tokyo to represent the United States at the @Olympics. The dedication of the athletes and coaches of the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic Teams is inspiring. We stand with @TeamUSA and will be cheering them on as they bring many medals back home 🇺🇸 https://t.co/vscMO5eMV3
label: R

text:
When it's my turn to host lunch, hot dogs are on the menu!
 
Enjoyed introducing my colleagues to some Utah favorites today, including @JDawgsUtah, @PioneerChips, and ice cream & chocolate milk from @BYU Creamery. Great having JDawgs founder Jayson Edwards with us as well! https://t.co/6MUECSbtAX
label: R

text: Chinese-made renewable energy components—products such as electric batteries for vehicles and cells for solar panels—are made with Uyghur forced labor. We must continue to pursue green technologies, but these goals can't come at the expense of our values. https://t.co/UO2WcXafqJ
label: R

text: Investing in innovation and deploying existing carbon-reducing technologies is the most effective way to address climate change. The U.S. must play a leadership role in the development and adaptation of these technologies to protect our planet for future generations. https://t.co/802IjtfA1D
label: R

text:
The numbers tell the story–#COVID19 is spreading quickly in Utah. 

I encourage all eligible Utahns to get vaccinated. 

These vaccines are safe, free, and readily available across the state. 

For more information: https://t.co/YNaANxkooW https://t.co/yluooR4BjD
label: R

text: Countries should think twice before getting in bed with the Putin regime. Turkey should reassess its relationship with Russia and align with its @NATO allies. https://t.co/wgJsZLW72W
label: R

text: The Delta variant is responsible for over 80% of new #COVID19 cases in the U.S. It's imperative that we quickly leverage existing, reliable epidemiological data on the effectiveness of vaccine boosters to determine if and when additional doses are needed. https://t.co/a1XhoZEJZw
label: R

text: Getting vaccinated is the best way to keep ourselves and our communities safe, and we must all do our part to address vaccine hesitancy. For more data and information, including how you can get a #COVID19 vaccine, check out @CDCgov, @HHSgov, @UtahCoronavirus & @UtahDepOfHealth. https://t.co/bqzz1AKR5l
label: R

text: This isn't just about stolen property—cyberattacks sponsored by the Chinese Communist Party pose a massive threat to our national security and that of our allies. @USNATO is right to accuse China of these attacks. The world must wake up to the threat China poses to global order. https://t.co/C262dDZChF
label: R

text: Utahns know all too well that the wildfires burning across the west are overwhelming many communities. Praying for the safety of these 57 courageous Utahns as they lend a helping hand to a nearby state in need. https://t.co/Z31MDUYfis
label: R

text: To be safe, Utahns should start their passport application with @TravelGov 6 months in advance of travel. There has been an increase in processing times due to increased demand and mail delays. For more information, including how to upgrade to expedited processing: https://t.co/7BiPrMgJfN
label: R

text: This harassment and suppression by Belarus officials is a hostile violation of fundamental human rights and must not continue. There's nothing authoritarian governments fear more than a free press like @RFERL. We stand with them in their mission to shine light on these abuses. https://t.co/Nt5cw7nrq6
label: R

text: Utahns who have not applied for a passport and are traveling in less than 12 weeks will likely need to request a walk-in appointment at a nearby passport office. However, this is done within 72 hours of travel—that’s why it’s important to start the application process early. https://t.co/7ZdVPYdq7o
label: R

text: Goods made by the Uyghur people in forced labor camps, sponsored by the Chinese Communist Party, have no place in the American market. Pleased that our legislation to ensure that items made with Uyghur forced labor don't wind up on our shelves unanimously passed the Senate. https://t.co/bDGS47kbUj
label: R

text: The #COVID19 vaccines are safe, effective, and free. We must all do our part to increase the confidence folks have in these vaccines and I urge all eligible Utahns to receive them without delay. https://t.co/nC8uM0RLDx
label: R

text: Increased demands for travel and mail delays are causing longer processing times for passports. Our team has been working with @TravelState, but it’s important to start the passport application process 6 months in advance of travel to be safe. For more information: https://t.co/cZjxduo13H
label: R

text: Terrifying. The lengths at which the Iranian government will go to silence critics—even American citizens—is appalling and unacceptable. This is yet another warning call that we must consistently take a hard line against their oppressive regime. https://t.co/HSfb7fyOGE
label: R

text: Outdated policies and poor federal forest management have led to devastating wildfires in Utah. My bill to establish a commission to study and recommend fire prevention, mitigation, and management policies was just unanimously voted out of committee. https://t.co/tsL8G29vKi
label: R

text: A thoughtful and accomplished public servant who will represent the U.S. and our interests well in a complex region of the world. I agree that foreign policy can be an area of bipartisanship and I look forward to meeting with my friend during his confirmation process. https://t.co/28P0EoMHI6
label: R

text: Our country’s infrastructure is in serious need of updates. The bipartisan infrastructure plan focuses on physical infrastructure without tax increases or adding to the deficit. It’s time we go beyond the rhetoric to get things done for our communities. https://t.co/ZQRu5TwnBf
label: R

text: This is the right decision. The U.S. should follow suit. https://t.co/l289OoMG1E
label: R

text: Though miles and sea separate us from the courageous Cubans demonstrating for freedom, we stand beside them with admiration and hope.
label: R

text: As one of the country’s fastest growing states, Utah is in need of additional infrastructure. Our bipartisan plan would provide Utah with funding to accommodate this rapid growth—including investment in roads, highways, and public transportation systems. https://t.co/ZQRu5TwnBf
label: R

text: The needs of Utahns have been forefront as I’ve helped negotiate our bipartisan infrastructure plan. Our plan would provide Utah with funding to expand our physical infrastructure and help fight wildfires without tax increases or adding to the deficit. https://t.co/ZQRu5TwnBf
label: R

text: As we celebrate our nation’s independence, let us continue the work of building a more perfect union. May we not take for granted the blessings that come with freedom and give thanks to the brave men and women who work to protect those freedoms every day. Happy #IndependenceDay https://t.co/Ai7bSU7Xlw
label: R

text: An authoritarian China is perhaps the greatest threat to freedom around the world. We’re seeing the effects that communism has on a society—suppressing independent thought and dissent, paired with egregious human rights violations. We must partner with allies to promote freedom.
label: R

text:
100 years of the Chinese Communist Party is nothing to celebrate. The CCP continues to:
 
- commit genocide of 1 million Uyghurs
- imprison or execute dissidents
- censor print, broadcast, and social media
- renege on promised freedoms in Hong Kong
- spy on its citizens
label: R

text: China’s so-called “national security” law has been weaponized to severely undermine the rights and freedoms of the people of Hong Kong. The Administration must make clear that US support for Hong Kongers in their struggle for autonomy remains unequivocal. https://t.co/DIDBVujhaT
label: R

text: Donald Rumsfeld was a true public servant. During his two terms as Secretary of Defense, nearly 30 years apart, his strong leadership helped guide our country through some of our most challenging times. My thoughts are with his wife, Joyce, their children, and his loved ones.
label: R

text: It’s been 1 year since the Chinese Communist Party enacted its “national security” law on Hong Kong—using mass arrests and unjust imprisonments to crush political dissent. I continue to stand with the people of Hong Kong in their quest for the autonomy they were promised.
label: R

text: Republicans will not sign up for a multi-trillion dollar spending spree, or raising taxes on job creators, for “human infrastructure” that will raise the deficit to levels that will harm future generations. That’s why our bipartisan deal focuses solely on physical infrastructure. https://t.co/35POIQ9eHE
label: R

text: Our bipartisan infrastructure deal is an historic investment in our nation’s physical infrastructure. It’s truly bipartisan, incorporating legislation crafted and passed out of the Senate committees of jurisdiction. This deal has bipartisan support. https://t.co/ypWp0YLJfd
label: R

text: The American people don’t want to see massive tax increases—they want us to address our aging physical infrastructure. Senate Republicans & Democrats, and the White House, support our bipartisan infrastructure deal. Democratic leadership must let it come to the floor for a vote. https://t.co/RK0Y0zlJrL
label: R

text: Our bipartisan infrastructure deal focuses on true infrastructure—roads, bridges, rail, broadband, water and electric infrastructure—without raising taxes. And I take the President at his word that he’ll sign this bill when it gets to his desk. https://t.co/2oB2yJ9iiY
label: R

text: The Chinese Communist Party has now successfully eliminated one of Hong Kong’s top pro-democracy newspapers in their endless pursuit of silencing dissent. There’s nothing more terrifying to an authoritarian regime than independent thought and a free press. https://t.co/e5vRyakw0Z
label: R

text: Our nation's infrastructure is in need of repair. We've reached a deal on an infrastructure package that focuses on physical infrastructure—roads, bridges, airports—without raising taxes or adding to the deficit. We'll keep working with colleagues to get this signed into law. https://t.co/ptrGLsb1X5
label: R

text: Six months. The Afghan government is estimated to collapse six months after a withdrawal of U.S. troops. Politics should never come before our national security interests. The President must reconsider his plan to withdraw all American troops from Afghanistan by September. https://t.co/AWVSUdggwA
label: R

text: At a time when we must restore trust in the American electoral system and ensure that elections continue to be fair and secure, S.1 does the exact opposite. It’s a divisive, federal takeover of elections which would use public dollars to fund political campaigns.
label: R

text: In Utah, nearly 400 wildfires have already burned more than 40,000 acres of land—surpassing the 5-year average for this time of year. We can't continue to adhere to outdated fire policies. Our bill will help craft a comprehensive strategy for preventing and fighting wildfires. https://t.co/aPsASSLW5q
label: R

text: The American West is facing a historic level of wildfires. My bill with @SenMarkKelly & @RepJohnCurtis would bring together officials from all levels of gov. & experts to improve strategies to prevent future wildfires from becoming catastrophic disasters. https://t.co/tsL8G2r6BQ
label: R

text: Legislation to repeal authorizations for use of military force against Iraq requires us to fully evaluate the legal and national security implications before voting. The Senate must hold a public hearing & a classified briefing before taking up this issue. https://t.co/ryuqvFRZlo
label: R

text: The Administration is promoting #ChildTaxCreditAwarenessDay, but POTUS’s plan is just temporary and adds to the debt. My plan makes a permanent commitment to American families and is fully paid for. We have the opportunity for a lasting, historic achievement if we work together. https://t.co/xWhmK24DzM
label: R

text: So far this year, in Utah, nearly 400 fires have burned more than 40,000 acres of land. My bill would create a commission of officials from all levels of government and outside experts to recommend policies that will prevent future wildfires from becoming catastrophic disasters. https://t.co/OpTJRsT9YM
label: R

text: Richard is a Vietnam War veteran and West Valley City resident who, unfortunately, lost many of his service medals 20 years ago. Our office helped him get replacement medals and this morning, I was able to present them to him. https://t.co/D3FfxmGSHM
label: R

text: Federal efforts to seriously evaluate our national fire policies have lacked critical input from state, local & nongovernmental stakeholders who are expert in managing fires, lands & disasters. In @DraperCity, I unveiled our Wildland Fire Mitigation & Management Commission Act. https://t.co/CiarKmN7Eo
label: R

text: I'm in Draper City unveiling my legislation to establish a wildfire commission which would conduct a national review of wildfire policy and make recommendations to Congress. Tune in: https://t.co/xKBXuvax7K
label: R

text: Each year, I have the honor of nominating some of Utah’s best and brightest students to our nation’s various service academies. This morning, I was able to meet with some of these students and wish them well before they head off to serve. I know they’ll represent our state well! https://t.co/bZbbDzXmW8
label: R

text: Utah’s once thriving arts and entertainment venues, already devastated by the pandemic, are going out of business while waiting for grant funding. @SBAgov must disburse its grant funding to struggling live entertainment venues without delay. https://t.co/iSVtNdlRYq
label: R

text: China is using its vaccines to expand its geopolitical power, and as an opportunity to spread propaganda that the US is not an ally of Taiwan. The US must continue to make delivery of safe and effective COVID vaccines to Taiwan, and other countries in need, an urgent priority. https://t.co/0J6K9xbhE5
label: R

text: The U.S. must be extraordinarily explicit—in partnership with our allies and free nations around the world—of the economic consequence that would ensue should the Chinese Communist Party continue down its current path with Taiwan, human rights, and predatory economic behavior. https://t.co/2FI9G1hZLT
label: R

text: The Chinese Communist Party is attempting to cut off Taiwan from global association and choke its economy—threatening invasion with military incursions and incendiary language. Just look at Hong Kong! The US must partner with allies to ensure Taiwan isn’t isolated from the world. https://t.co/Nv3ySNKfOZ
label: R

text:
The U.S. believes that the people of Taiwan should be allowed to determine their own destiny.
 
The Chinese Communist Party believes that it is free to usurp the will of the people of Taiwan.
 
We must support Taiwan's autonomy. https://t.co/MqWKtXsIE3
label: R

text: Taiwan is an important ally and plays a significant role in countering China’s aggression in the region. Live soon→ @SenMarkey and I are hosting a @SenateForeign hearing to discuss ways in which the U.S. can strengthen its relationship with Taiwan: https://t.co/k2VA3THY3p
label: R

text: Traffic congestion has become an issue in Utah and in places all across the country. Thrilled that @SenateCommerce adopted my language in their surface transportation bill to reduce congestion and improve the safety and effectiveness of our roads. https://t.co/3aG5egoma6
label: R

text: Several wilderness-designated areas along Utah's Bonneville Shoreline Trail are hampering its full use for recreation. I urged my @EnergyGOP & @EnergyDems colleagues to consider legislation to adjust the trail's boundaries to ensure that construction can be fully completed. https://t.co/PIZLypp8bX
label: R

text: Met with @SaltLakeCC President Huftalin to discuss the needs of community college students in Utah and across the country. I also congratulated her on the Men’s Soccer Team’s big win of the @NJCAA National Championship last week! https://t.co/XbPMLAcLCR
label: R

text: During wildfires, the heroic actions of Utah’s firefighters and first responders are on full display. Thank you for all your efforts to protect our communities. Praying for your continued safety. https://t.co/Dl5KfKq3yM
label: R

text: 246 years strong. Happy birthday @USArmy! https://t.co/TxUkpDOjYS
label: R

text: China has largely been able to hide the genocide of the Uyghur people from the world at large. This is unacceptable. Free countries around the world must speak out against the Chinese Communist Party's grave human rights abuses—it's the only way to stop the genocide. https://t.co/MVCtXVuaHo
label: R

text: Call this what it is: Russia is giving a state sponsor of terrorism an advanced tech platform that it will use to bring more destabilization to the Middle East. The President must give a clear-eyed rebuke of Russia’s behavior when he meets with Putin. https://t.co/gG241lFPAQ
label: R

text: The Chinese Communist Party is successfully orchestrating the deportation of Uyghurs—and not just political activists—from other countries to conceal their human rights abuses. The lengths at which the CCP will go to keep the Uyghur genocide under wraps should alarm the world. https://t.co/FENHO6dI3A
label: R

text: What the Chinese Communist Party is perpetrating on the Uyghur people is atrocity not seen or imagined coming from a nation in our era—concentration camps, forced labor, Uyghur women being raped by Han Chinese men. The world must not turn a blind eye to these horrific actions. https://t.co/JPQZosNIi9
label: R

text: The Administration's announcement of donating 500 million COVID vaccines to countries in desperate need is exactly the role the U.S. should be playing in this global pandemic. I spoke with @StateDept this morning, and they understand the urgency of the global vaccination effort.
label: R

text: Before making a final decision on the Bears Ears and Grand Staircase-Escalante national monuments, we're asking the President to meet with us and to share @Interior @SecDebHaaland's report. We remain committed to finding a permanent, legislative solution. https://t.co/u0aYnRK1Um
label: R

text: Traffic congestion has become an issue in Utah's cities and in many of our country's metropolitan areas. Our Smart Intersections Act would reduce congestion & improve the safety & effectiveness of our roads, while also reducing fuel costs & air pollution. https://t.co/mHduOfkqGp
label: R

text: The U.S. partnership with Taiwan continues to grow despite the Chinese Communist Party's efforts to isolate Taiwan from the world. @SenMarkey and I will hold a @SenateForeign subcommittee hearing next week to explore ways to grow this critical partnership. https://t.co/1EpwYCQnmu
label: R

text: COVID-19 vaccines are safe and effective—and importantly, free! Utahns can find vaccine information here: https://t.co/LXepyYoutE. Find a vaccination site near you: https://t.co/lvnHXtGB5l
label: R

text: Whether committing genocide or stealing intellectual property, the Chinese Communist Party will go to great lengths to make China the world’s dominant player. The China package passed today included eight of my amendments aimed at countering this threat. https://t.co/86Be5CCp2r
label: R

text: A country that commits genocide against its people does not deserve an Olympic showcase. The Senate today voted for a US diplomatic boycott of the Beijing Olympics. This solution repudiates China’s ongoing human rights abuses in a way that is not detrimental to American athletes.
label: R

text: The VP’s campaign to address the “root causes” of illegal immigration won’t solve our current crisis. We can’t eradicate poverty and crime here at home, let alone across all of Latin America. Our free enterprise system will always lure people in search of better opportunities.
label: R

text: It is unacceptable that an American company may have extended the Chinese Communist Party’s censorship to the U.S. @Microsoft must explain whether the censorship of images associated with the anniversary of the Tiananmen Square Massacre were intentional. https://t.co/4T6HZdT5SV
label: R

text: Glad @FEMA has approved the state’s request for assistance in Garfield County. We must ramp up coordination with state & local leaders on wildfire mitigation and prevention efforts. Praying for the safety of the firefighters who are working to get the #MammothFire under control. https://t.co/2ZrS4GqIEh
label: R

text: It has been 77 years since Allied Forces stormed the beaches of Normandy on D-Day—taking incredible risks to safeguard freedom and liberate an entire continent. We will never forget the sacrifices of the Greatest Generation 🇺🇸 https://t.co/lw0HEwGlwF
label: R

text: More than 30 years after the Tiananmen Square massacre, the Chinese Communist Party continues to imprison or execute dissidents in its quest to quash any semblance of freedom. We must continue to condemn the repression of human rights in China & Hong Kong. https://t.co/8gVXhQR9zk
label: R

text: Countries like Taiwan & India are in desperate need of #COVID19 vaccines, so I’m pleased that the Administration is moving into the implementation stage of its global vaccine distribution plan. US vaccines are far safer and more effective than those coming out of China or Russia.
label: R

text: It’s been nearly 80 years since Theodore Jensen went missing following the attack on Pearl Harbor and now his remains are finally home. The prayers of Theo’s family have been answered. https://t.co/RHnUIXbevq
label: R

text: Today, we remember the two Utahns we lost this past year in service to our nation—@USAirForce 1st Lieutenant Kenneth “Kage” Allen and @USArmy Sergeant Bryan Mount. We will never forget the sacrifice of these fine men, and all of those who serve our country with such great honor. https://t.co/WNUDLOr6u5
label: R

text: Our fallen heroes shouldn’t exist in history as merely a name and rank on a memorial marker. Grateful that initiatives like Utah’s “Stories Behind the Stars” make sure that the servicemen who never returned are remembered, and that their stories endure. https://t.co/nRJCf9oCYa
label: R

text: The cause of freedom comes at a dear cost. On #MemorialDay, we honor the brave men and women who have given their lives in service to our country—protecting the freedoms we hold most dear and securing those very freedoms for others 🇺🇸 https://t.co/0dTlOtHYAL
label: R

text: My Family Security Act would give greater financial security to American families by streamlining existing federal benefits into direct cash payments to parents. Tune in for my conversation with @DeseretNews and @FamStudies on family policy, live now: https://t.co/JedTRFQKnp
label: R

text: The U.S. is in urgent need of a comprehensive strategy to counter the China threat. My amendments to the China package require the President to develop a grand China strategy, drill down on CCP propaganda efforts, support Taiwan's independence, and more: https://t.co/FzSmPdIsdE
label: R

text: The Social Security and Medicare trusts funds will be depleted within the next 11 years. Our bipartisan TRUST Act is designed to rescue these federal trusts funds from impending insolvency because simply ignoring this looming crisis is irresponsible. https://t.co/WwMsmsmn67
label: R

text: Alexander Lukashenko has taken to calling in a fake bomb threat to force land a civilian aircraft to silence an activist. The lengths to which a brutal dictator will go to quash dissent never ceases to amaze. Roman Protasevič must be released immediately. https://t.co/VwHLyi0230
label: R

text: We must do more to provide access to treatment for those who want to escape opioid abuse and addiction. My bill with @Sen_JoeManchin would help fund treatment facilities around the country, bolstering Utah's efforts to combat the opioid epidemic. https://t.co/B5hIinZxcl
label: R

text: China is using its far less effective COVID vaccine to push countries in desperate need of vaccines to follow China’s political goals. The U.S. must urgently move beyond the planning stage to the implementation stage of global vaccine distribution. https://t.co/WKOihrMgTG
